Package com.seinksansdoozebank.fr.model.player

Class SmartBot

java.lang.Object
com.seinksansdoozebank.fr.model.player.Player
com.seinksansdoozebank.fr.model.player.SmartBot
All Implemented Interfaces:
Opponent
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuilderBot, OpportunistBot, RichardBot
public class SmartBot extends Player
Represents a smart bot which will try to build the cheaper district in its hand in order to finish its citadel as fast as possible
